game.name: Coconut Party
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play as the king of Hawaii in this thrilling stylized FPT (First Person Thrower) game! Fend off the colonist invasion and get stronger with each day. Do you have what it takes to defeat them? Or will Hawaii fall to their wrath? Only you can stop them in order to get your Coconut Party!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as the king of Hawaii in this thrilling stylized FPT (First Person Thrower) game! Fend off the colonist invasion and get stronger with each day. Do you have what it takes to defeat them? Or will Hawaii fall to their wrath? Only you can stop them in order to get your Coconut Party!
